languages.text: "Хротко, как ты оказался рядом так вовремя?"
"Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"
languages.original_text: "Хротко, как ты оказался рядом так вовремя?"

traits.locale_text: "Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"
"Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"
"Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"
"Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"
"Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"
"Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"
"Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"

languages.text: "Hrotko, wie kann es sein, dass Ihr im richtigen Moment hier seid?"
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"

traits.locale_text: "Hrotko, wie kann es sein, dass Ihr im richtigen Moment hier seid?"

languages.text: « Hrotko, comment se fait-il que vous soyez arrivé pile au bon moment ? »
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"

traits.locale_text: « Hrotko, comment se fait-il que vous soyez arrivé pile au bon moment ? »

languages.text: «Hrotko, ¿cómo es que ha llegado en el momento oportuno?».
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"

traits.locale_text: «Hrotko, ¿cómo es que ha llegado en el momento oportuno?».

languages.text: 「フロトコ、どうしてこのタイミングでここに来たんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"

traits.locale_text: 「フロトコ、どうしてこのタイミングでここに来たんだ？」

languages.text: “赫洛卡，你怎么会这么巧，刚好在这个时候出现了？”
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"

traits.locale_text: “赫洛卡，你怎么会这么巧，刚好在这个时候出现了？”

languages.text: "Hrotko, buraya tam doğru anda gelebilmeyi nasıl başardın?"
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, how did you come to be here at just the right moment?"
